pages.text: You don't have a lot of options for generating energy on this planet, and your reactor went kapoop causing your crash. Looks like you'll have to improvise.$(br2)Thermal Expansion's Steam Dynamo has had its recipe changed to not require Silver. This means you can use this as an early power generation.

A Steam Dynamo requires a solid fuel source and water to generate energy. An Aqueous Accumulator can help you pump consistent water into the Dynamo. Connect the two with a Fluiduct after surrounding the sides of the Accumulator with water.$(br2)You are severely limited in terms of technology until you can travel to other planets and/or mine asteroids for advanced resources.
